description: This table contains denial information stored in the Denial/Remark/Correspondence records in the Denial/Correspondence (BDC) master file. There can be multiple lines of data for each record. Each line represents one claim/explanations of benefits (EOB) line that was denied.

columns.name: BDC_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the denial or correspondence record.

columns.name: LINE_COUNT
columns.description: Line number of denial data. There can be multiple lines of denial data and this is the number of the line that enterprise reporting is extracting.

columns.name: LINE_ON_EOB
columns.description: This column stores the line on explanation of benefits that was denied. "-1" represents the total denial data that is the sum of the invoice-level and sum of line-level data. "0" represents the invoice-level data.

columns.name: LINE_BILLED_AMOUNT
columns.description: Billed amount on the claim line that was denied. If the denial was at the invoice level - this is the billed amount for the entire claim

columns.name: LINE_ALLWD_AMT
columns.description: Allowed amount for claim line that was denied. If the denial was for the entire invoice this is the allowed amount for the entire claim.

columns.name: LINE_PAID_AMT
columns.description: This column stores the amount paid for the line that was denied. $0.00 if fully denied, >0 if partially denied. If the denial was for the entire invoice then this is the amount paid for the entire claim.

columns.name: LINE_DENIED_AMT
columns.description: Denied amount for claim line that was denied. If the denial is for the entire invoice then this is the denied amount for the claim.

columns.name: LINE_COMMENTS
columns.description: This column stores comments on explanation of benefits for denied line.

columns.name: LINE_REVENUE_CODE_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the line-level revenue code for the denial.

columns.name: LINE_REVENUE_CODE_ID_REVENUE_CODE_NAME
columns.description: The name of the revenue code.

columns.name: LINE_CPT_CODE
columns.description: This item stores the line-level CPT(R) code for the denial.

columns.name: LINE_PRIMARY_CHARGE_TX_ID
columns.description: Charge with the greatest amount from the claim line that was denied. If two charges have the same amount the older one will be the primary charge.

columns.name: LINE_SERVICE_DATE
columns.description: The line level service date of the denial.

columns.name: LINE_QUANTITY
columns.description: The line level quantity for the denied line.
